recipe.title: Grill Basket "Stir-Fry" Vegetables
ingredients: 2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick half-moons
1 fennel bulb, trimmed and cut into thin 1/2-inch wedges
8 ounces cremini mushrooms, cut in half, or quartered if large
1 pound asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
instructions: 1. In a large bowl, combine 2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick half-moons; 1 fennel bulb, trimmed and cut into thin 1/2-inch wedges; 8 ounces cremini mushrooms, cut in half, or quartered if large; and 1 pound asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces. Drizzle over enough extra-virgin olive oil to coat the vegetables, tossing. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and any chopped herbs you choose.
2. Place the veggies in a grill basket and cook on the hot grill for 15 to 20 minutes, tossing and flipping the basket occasionally, until they're tender and slightly charred at the edges.
